DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the role of high dose chemotherapy with autologous hematopoietic cell transplantation for AML.
DOC.brief_title: Autologous Bone Marrow Transplantation in Acute Non-Lymphoblastic Leukemia During First or Subsequent Remission
DOC.detailed_description: To use high dose chemotherapy with autologous stem cell rescue to try to increase the chance of long term control and cure of the disease.
DOC.criteria: must be in remission adequate organ function prior MDS active infection liver disease
